description: This table contains order template information relating to admission, transfer, and discharge, as well as lab specimens and releasing information.

columns.name: OTP_ID
columns.description: The order template ID.

columns.name: ADMIT_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the admitting department.

columns.name: ADMIT_SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The admission service.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADMIT_LVL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The admission level of care.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_ID
columns.description: The admission diagnosis.

columns.name: ADMIT_LEN_STAY
columns.description: The admission expected length of stay.

columns.name: ADMIT_DISCHG_DATE
columns.description: The admission expected discharge date.

columns.name: ADMIT_RESIDENT_ID
columns.description: The provider ID of the senior admitting resident.

columns.name: ADMIT_INTERN_ID
columns.description: The provider ID of the admitting intern.

columns.name: ADMIT_EXP_ADMIT_DT
columns.description: The expected admission date.

columns.name: TRANS_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The transfer department.

columns.name: TRANS_SVC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The transfer service.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ADMIT_SERVICE_C_NAME

columns.name: TRANS_LVL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The transfer level of care.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ADMIT_LVL_OF_CARE_C_NAME

columns.name: TRANS_DX_ID
columns.description: The transfer diagnosis.

columns.name: TRANS_LEN_OF_STAY
columns.description: The transfer expected length of stay.

columns.name: TRANS_DISCHRG_DATE
columns.description: The transfer expected discharge date.

columns.name: TRANS_ATTND_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider ID of the transfer attending provider.

columns.name: DISCHRG_EXPECT_DATE
columns.description: The expected discharge date.

columns.name: DISCHRG_EXPECT_TM
columns.description: The expected discharge time.

columns.name: DISCHRG_DISP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The discharge disposition.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DISCHRG_DEST_C_NAME
columns.description:
The discharge destination.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SPECIMEN_TAKEN_DATE
columns.description: The date when a lab specimen was taken for this treatment plan order.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_TAKEN_TIME
columns.description: The time when a lab specimen was taken for this treatment plan order.

columns.name: RELEASING_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who released this order template.

columns.name: RELEASING_DTTM
columns.description: The instant (date and time) when this order template was released.

columns.name: DEFAULT_RELEASE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is the release type for the standing treatment plan order (Manual or Auto)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Auto


Manual

columns.name: DEFAULT_INTERVAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is the release interval of the standing treatment plan order


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADMIT_COND_C_NAME
columns.description:
The admission condition.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TRANS_COND_C_NAME
columns.description:
The transfer condition.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ADMIT_COND_C_NAME

columns.name: REL_OFFSET
columns.description: Stores the amount of time after the reference time in the treatment day that the order should start.  See column REL_OFFSET_TYPE_C to see if this amount is specified in minutes or hours.

columns.name: REL_OFFSET_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the type of the that is specified in the column REL_OFFSET (minutes vs. hours).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Minutes


Hours

columns.name: ORIGINAL_DOSE
columns.description: The original dose of an order before it was modified.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_UNITS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The dose units that correspond to the original dose of the order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PCT_OF_ORIG_DOSE
columns.description: For dose-modified order templates, this item stores the percentage ratio of the current dose to the original dose.

columns.name: PAT_UPD_DT
columns.description: The effective date of the patient update that should be generated from this order template.

columns.name: PAT_UPD_TM
columns.description: The effective time of the patient update that should be generated from this order template.

columns.name: PAT_UPD_PAT_CLS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient class of the patient update that should be generated from this order template.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_UPD_SVC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The service of the patient update that should be generated from this order template.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ADMIT_SERVICE_C_NAME

columns.name: PAT_UPD_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The level of care of the patient update that should be generated from this order template.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ADMIT_LVL_OF_CARE_C_NAME

columns.name: PAT_UPD_ACCOM_CD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The accommodation code of the patient update that should be generated from this order template.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_UPD_ACCOM_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The accommodation reason of the patient update that should be generated from this order template.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_UPD_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for change of the patient update that should be generated from this order template.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ORIG_DOSE_VERIFY_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who last verified the original dose of the order.

columns.name: ORIG_DOSE_VER_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant that the original dose of the order was last verified.

columns.name: ORDERED_AS_MED_ID
columns.description: The medication (ERX) ID of the medication that was originally selected.

columns.name: OTP_AUC
columns.description: Item to store the area under curve value for medications using this value in dose calculation.

columns.name: OTP_SEL_TARGETAUC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Selected type of the Target AUC in the order composer.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Treatment Plan Target AUC


Order-Specific Target AUC

columns.name: PLANNED_DAY_OF_RNG
columns.description: This item stores which day in the treatment day's treatment range that this order was planned for.  For example, if a treatment day is 3 days long and this order was signed with a start date of "S+1", then this item would store 1 because it was planned for one day after the start of the treatment.

columns.name: CRCL_FORMULA_ID
columns.description: The creatinine clearance programming point that will be used for area under the curve calculations for an order whose dose calculation programming point does not specify a creatinine clearance programming point.

columns.name: CRCL_FORMULA_ID_LPP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the extension.

columns.name: SELECTED_CRCL_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the selected source for creatinine clearance.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Formula


Order Specific

columns.name: CRCL_ORD_SPEC_VAL

columns.name: SCR_ORD_SPEC_VAL

columns.name: USE_AUC_DOSE_YN
columns.description:
Stores info whether system should automatically update dose for the order using AUC calculations 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: RFL_DIF_PROB_YN
columns.description:
This column returns "Y" if the referral order is for a problem different from the problem being treated in the encounter where the order was placed. If the referral order is for the same problem then "N" or nothing is returned. This column can only be populated if an organization has the PAS license.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: HOSP_AREA_ID
columns.description: Hospital area to request a patient transfer.

columns.name: TRANSFER_REQUEST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of transfer to request being ordered.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
